Uses of Interface
org.wildfly.security.audit.AuditEndpoint

  • Packages that use AuditEndpoint 
    Package Description
    org.wildfly.security.audit
    Audit logging related resources.

    • Uses of AuditEndpoint in org.wildfly.security.audit

      Classes in org.wildfly.security.audit that implement AuditEndpoint 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  FileAuditEndpoint
      An audit endpoint to record all audit events to a local file.
      class  PeriodicRotatingFileAuditEndpoint
      An audit endpoint which rotates the log at a preset time interval.
      class  SizeRotatingFileAuditEndpoint
      An audit endpoint which rotates the log when log file size reach given value.
      class  SyslogAuditEndpoint
      An audit endpoint that logs to syslog server.
      Methods in org.wildfly.security.audit that return AuditEndpoint 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      AuditEndpoint FileAuditEndpoint.Builder.build()
      Construct a new file audit endpoint.
      AuditEndpoint PeriodicRotatingFileAuditEndpoint.Builder.build()
      Construct a new instance.
      AuditEndpoint SizeRotatingFileAuditEndpoint.Builder.build()
      Construct a new instance.
      AuditEndpoint SyslogAuditEndpoint.Builder.build()
      Build a new AuditEndpoint configured to pass all messages using Syslog.
